result.description: Brice Turang called out on strikes.
Jackson Chourio singles on a soft bunt ground ball to third baseman Matt Chapman.
Christian Yelich singles on a ground ball to left fielder Heliot Ramos.

details.description: With Christian Yelich batting, Jackson Chourio picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, shortstop Willy Adames.

result.description: William Contreras walks. Christian Yelich to 2nd.
Rhys Hoskins pops out to shortstop Willy Adames.
Willy Adames strikes out swinging and Mike Yastrzemski caught stealing 2nd, catcher William Contreras to second baseman Brice Turang to catcher William Contreras.
Jung Hoo Lee grounds out, second baseman Brice Turang to first baseman Rhys Hoskins.
Sal Frelick singles on a line drive to center fielder Jung Hoo Lee.
Joey Ortiz grounds into a force out, third baseman Matt Chapman to second baseman Tyler Fitzgerald. Sal Frelick out at 2nd. Joey Ortiz to 1st.
Caleb Durbin homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field. Joey Ortiz scores.
